ViewObject.Name: PerformanceVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
SELECT PERF_PERIODO, PERF_PERIODO_EDIT, PERF_TIPO_PERIODO, PERF_EMPRESA, PERF_SECCION, SUM(CASE WHEN :PerfCelulaBV IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE PERF_CELULA END) AS PERF_CELULA, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_DATO_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_DATO_MENSUAL FROM ( SELECT FLOOR(PERF_FECHAJOR / 10000) AS PERF_PERIODO, TO_CHAR(FLOOR (PERF_FECHAJOR / 10000)) AS PERF_PERIODO_EDIT, -1 AS PERF_TIPO_PERIODO, PERF_EMPRESA, PERF_SECCION, PERF_CELULA, COUNT(DISTINCT PERF_FECHAJOR) AS PERF_FECHAJOR_EDIT, SUM(PERF_PRODUCIDO) AS PERF_PRODUCIDO_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_PRODUCIDO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPCAMBIO) AS PERF_TPCAMBIO_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPCAMBIO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPLIMPIEZA) AS PERF_TPLIMPIEZA_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPLIMPIEZA_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPLIMPIEZAC) AS PERF_TPLIMPIEZAC_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPLIMPIEZAC_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPREGLAJE) AS PERF_TPREGLAJE_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPREGLAJE_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPTINTAS) AS PERF_TPTINTAS_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPTINTAS_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPMATERIAL) AS PERF_TPMATERIAL_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPMATERIAL_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPMANTENI) AS PERF_TPMANTENI_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPMANTENI_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPMANINTER) AS PERF_TPMANINTER_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPMANINTER_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TVACIO) AS PERF_TVACIO_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TVACIO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPNOATEND) AS PERF_TPNOATEND_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPNOATEND_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPSINMOT) AS PERF_TPSINMOT_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPSINMOT_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPUTIL) AS PERF_TPUTIL_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPUTIL_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TBONO) AS PERF_TBONO_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TBONO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TBOCADILLO) AS PERF_TBOCADILLO_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TBOCADILLO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_PRODEQUIV) AS PERF_PRODEQUIV_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_PRODEQUIV_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN PERF_SWPRODTEOR = 'S' THEN PERF_PRODTEOR ELSE PERF_PRODUCIDO END) AS PERF_PRODUCIDO_EDIT_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_PRODUCIDO_EDIT_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN PERF_LABORABLE = 'S' AND (PERF_PRODUCIDO != 0 OR (PERF_TBONO + PERF_TMUESTRAS) != PERF_TBOCADILLO) THEN CASE WHEN PERF_SWPRODTEOR = 'S' THEN PERF_PRODTEOR ELSE PERF_PRODUCIDO END ELSE 0 END) AS PERF_PRODULABO_EDIT_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_PRODULABO_EDIT_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TDESCANSO) AS PERF_TDESCANSO_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TDESCANSO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TMOD) AS PERF_TMOD_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TMOD_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TMUESTRAS) AS PERF_TMUESTRAS_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TMUESTRAS_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TNECESPERS) AS PERF_TNECESPERS_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TNECESPERS_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TNOCONTROL) AS PERF_TNOCONTROL_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TNOCONTROL_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TNOIMPUT) AS PERF_TNOIMPUT_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TNOIMPUT_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TNPRODNP) AS PERF_TNPRODNP_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TNPRODNP_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TNPRODP) AS PERF_TNPRODP_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TNPRODP_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPARO) AS PERF_TPARO_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPARO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPCARTACOL) AS PERF_TPCARTACOL_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPCARTACOL_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPDECICOME) AS PERF_TPDECICOME_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPDECICOME_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPIMASD) AS PERF_TPIMASD_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPIMASD_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPREFORMA) AS PERF_TPREFORMA_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPREFORMA_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPAROCONOF) AS PERF_TPAROCONOF_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPAROCONOF_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPAROPROGR) AS PERF_TPAROPROGR_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPAROPROGR_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPESPEURGE) AS PERF_TPESPEURGE_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPESPEURGE_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPRESENCIA) AS PERF_TPRESENCIA_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPRESENCIA_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_CONSUMIDO) AS PERF_CONSUMIDO_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_CONSUMIDO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_CADENA) AS PERF_CADENA_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_CADENA_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_CAPSUCAMB) AS PERF_CAPSUCAMB_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_CAPSUCAMB_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_PRODCAMB) AS PERF_PRODCAMB_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_PRODCAMB_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_NROCAMBC) AS PERF_NROCAMBC_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_NROCAMBC_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOCAMBC) AS PERF_TPOCAMBC_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPOCAMBC_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOREGLC) AS PERF_TPOREGLC_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPOREGLC_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOTINTC) AS PERF_TPOTINTC_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPOTINTC_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOCAMB) AS PERF_TPOCAMB_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPOCAMB_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOREGL) AS PERF_TPOREGL_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPOREGL_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOTINT) AS PERF_TPOTINT_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPOTINT_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_PROD_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_PROD_DESP_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_PROD_DESP_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_CONS_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_CONS_DESP_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_CONS_DESP_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_CAD_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_CAD_DESP_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_CAD_DESP_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_CCAMB_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_CCAMB_DESP_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_CCAMB_DESP_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_PCAMB_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_PCAMB_DESP_ANUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_PCAMB_DESP_MENSUAL FROM TPROPERF_L WHERE PERF_FECHAJOR > :AnoRupturaBV - :AnosHistoricoBV || '0000' AND PERF_FECHAJOR < :AnoRupturaBV || '0000' GROUP BY FLOOR (PERF_FECHAJOR / 10000), -1, PERF_EMPRESA, PERF_SECCION, PERF_CELULA
UNION ALL
SELECT FLOOR(PERF_FECHAJOR / 10000) AS PERF_PERIODO, TO_CHAR(FLOOR (PERF_FECHAJOR / 10000)) AS PERF_PERIODO_EDIT, 0 AS PERF_TIPO_PERIODO, PERF_EMPRESA, PERF_SECCION, PERF_CELULA, COUNT(DISTINCT PERF_FECHAJOR) AS PERF_FECHAJOR_EDIT, SUM(PERF_PRODUCIDO) AS PERF_PRODUCIDO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_PRODUCIDO) AS PERF_PRODUCIDO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPCAMBIO) AS PERF_TPCAMBIO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPCAMBIO) AS PERF_TPCAMBIO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPLIMPIEZA) AS PERF_TPLIMPIEZA_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPLIMPIEZA) AS PERF_TPLIMPIEZA_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPLIMPIEZAC) AS PERF_TPLIMPIEZAC_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPLIMPIEZAC) AS PERF_TPLIMPIEZAC_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPREGLAJE) AS PERF_TPREGLAJE_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPREGLAJE) AS PERF_TPREGLAJE_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPTINTAS) AS PERF_TPTINTAS_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPTINTAS) AS PERF_TPTINTAS_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPMATERIAL) AS PERF_TPMATERIAL_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPMATERIAL) AS PERF_TPMATERIAL_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPMANTENI) AS PERF_TPMANTENI_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPMANTENI) AS PERF_TPMANTENI_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPMANINTER) AS PERF_TPMANINTER_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPMANINTER) AS PERF_TPMANINTER_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TVACIO) AS PERF_TVACIO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TVACIO) AS PERF_TVACIO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPNOATEND) AS PERF_TPNOATEND_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPNOATEND) AS PERF_TPNOATEND_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPSINMOT) AS PERF_TPSINMOT_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPSINMOT) AS PERF_TPSINMOT_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPUTIL) AS PERF_TPUTIL_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPUTIL) AS PERF_TPUTIL_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TBONO) AS PERF_TBONO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TBONO) AS PERF_TBONO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TBOCADILLO) AS PERF_TBOCADILLO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TBOCADILLO) AS PERF_TBOCADILLO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_PRODEQUIV) AS PERF_PRODEQUIV_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_PRODEQUIV) AS PERF_PRODEQUIV_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN PERF_SWPRODTEOR = 'S' THEN PERF_PRODTEOR ELSE PERF_PRODUCIDO END) AS PERF_PRODUCIDO_EDIT_ANUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN PERF_SWPRODTEOR = 'S' THEN PERF_PRODTEOR ELSE PERF_PRODUCIDO END) AS PERF_PRODUCIDO_EDIT_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN PERF_LABORABLE = 'S' AND (PERF_PRODUCIDO != 0 OR (PERF_TBONO + PERF_TMUESTRAS) != PERF_TBOCADILLO) THEN CASE WHEN PERF_SWPRODTEOR = 'S' THEN PERF_PRODTEOR ELSE PERF_PRODUCIDO END ELSE 0 END) AS PERF_PRODULABO_EDIT_ANUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN PERF_LABORABLE = 'S' AND (PERF_PRODUCIDO != 0 OR (PERF_TBONO + PERF_TMUESTRAS) != PERF_TBOCADILLO) THEN CASE WHEN PERF_SWPRODTEOR = 'S' THEN PERF_PRODTEOR ELSE PERF_PRODUCIDO END ELSE 0 END) AS PERF_PRODULABO_EDIT_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TDESCANSO) AS PERF_TDESCANSO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TDESCANSO) AS PERF_TDESCANSO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TMOD) AS PERF_TMOD_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TMOD) AS PERF_TMOD_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TMUESTRAS) AS PERF_TMUESTRAS_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TMUESTRAS) AS PERF_TMUESTRAS_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TNECESPERS) AS PERF_TNECESPERS_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TNECESPERS) AS PERF_TNECESPERS_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TNOCONTROL) AS PERF_TNOCONTROL_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TNOCONTROL) AS PERF_TNOCONTROL_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TNOIMPUT) AS PERF_TNOIMPUT_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TNOIMPUT) AS PERF_TNOIMPUT_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TNPRODNP) AS PERF_TNPRODNP_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TNPRODNP) AS PERF_TNPRODNP_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TNPRODP) AS PERF_TNPRODP_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TNPRODP) AS PERF_TNPRODP_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPARO) AS PERF_TPARO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPARO) AS PERF_TPARO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPCARTACOL) AS PERF_TPCARTACOL_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPCARTACOL) AS PERF_TPCARTACOL_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPDECICOME) AS PERF_TPDECICOME_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPDECICOME) AS PERF_TPDECICOME_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPIMASD) AS PERF_TPIMASD_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPIMASD) AS PERF_TPIMASD_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPREFORMA) AS PERF_TPREFORMA_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPREFORMA) AS PERF_TPREFORMA_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPAROCONOF) AS PERF_TPAROCONOF_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPAROCONOF) AS PERF_TPAROCONOF_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPAROPROGR) AS PERF_TPAROPROGR_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPAROPROGR) AS PERF_TPAROPROGR_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPESPEURGE) AS PERF_TPESPEURGE_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPESPEURGE) AS PERF_TPESPEURGE_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPRESENCIA) AS PERF_TPRESENCIA_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPRESENCIA) AS PERF_TPRESENCIA_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_CONSUMIDO) AS PERF_CONSUMIDO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_CONSUMIDO) AS PERF_CONSUMIDO_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_CADENA) AS PERF_CADENA_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_CADENA) AS PERF_CADENA_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_CAPSUCAMB) AS PERF_CAPSUCAMB_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_CAPSUCAMB) AS PERF_CAPSUCAMB_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_PRODCAMB) AS PERF_PRODCAMB_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_PRODCAMB) AS PERF_PRODCAMB_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_NROCAMBC) AS PERF_NROCAMBC_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_NROCAMBC) AS PERF_NROCAMBC_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOCAMBC) AS PERF_TPOCAMBC_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOCAMBC) AS PERF_TPOCAMBC_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOREGLC) AS PERF_TPOREGLC_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOREGLC) AS PERF_TPOREGLC_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOTINTC) AS PERF_TPOTINTC_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOTINTC) AS PERF_TPOTINTC_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOCAMB) AS PERF_TPOCAMB_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOCAMB) AS PERF_TPOCAMB_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOREGL) AS PERF_TPOREGL_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOREGL) AS PERF_TPOREGL_MENSUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOTINT) AS PERF_TPOTINT_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOTINT) AS PERF_TPOTINT_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_PROD_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_CONS_DESP_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_PROD_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_PROD_DESP_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_CONS_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_CONS_DESP_ANUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_CONS_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_CONS_DESP_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_CAD_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_CAD_DESP_ANUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_CAD_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_CAD_DESP_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_CCAMB_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_CCAMB_DESP_ANUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_CCAMB_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_CCAMB_DESP_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_PCAMB_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_PCAMB_DESP_ANUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_PCAMB_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_PCAMB_DESP_MENSUAL FROM TPROPERF_L WHERE PERF_FECHAJOR > :AnoRupturaBV || '0000' AND PERF_FECHAJOR <= :HastaFechaBV GROUP BY FLOOR(PERF_FECHAJOR / 10000), 0, PERF_EMPRESA, PERF_SECCION, PERF_CELULA
UNION ALL
SELECT TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PERF_FECHAJOR, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMM')) AS PERF_PERIODO, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PERF_FECHAJOR, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'MONTH') AS PERF_PERIODO_EDIT, 1 AS PERF_TIPO_PERIODO, PERF_EMPRESA, PERF_SECCION, PERF_CELULA, COUNT(DISTINCT PERF_FECHAJOR) AS PERF_FECHAJOR_EDIT, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_PRODUCIDO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_PRODUCIDO) AS PERF_PRODUCIDO_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPCAMBIO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPCAMBIO) AS PERF_TPCAMBIO_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPLIMPIEZA_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPLIMPIEZA) AS PERF_TPLIMPIEZA_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPLIMPIEZAC_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPLIMPIEZAC) AS PERF_TPLIMPIEZAC_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPREGLAJE_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPREGLAJE) AS PERF_TPREGLAJE_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPTINTAS_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPTINTAS) AS PERF_TPTINTAS_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPMATERIAL_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPMATERIAL) AS PERF_TPMATERIAL_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPMANTENI_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPMANTENI) AS PERF_TPMANTENI_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPMANINTER_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPMANINTER) AS PERF_TPMANINTER_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TVACIO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TVACIO) AS PERF_TVACIO_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPNOATEND_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPNOATEND) AS PERF_TPNOATEND_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPSINMOT_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPSINMOT) AS PERF_TPSINMOT_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPUTIL_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPUTIL) AS PERF_TPUTIL_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TBONO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TBONO) AS PERF_TBONO_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TBOCADILLO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TBOCADILLO) AS PERF_TBOCADILLO_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_PRODEQUIV_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_PRODEQUIV) AS PERF_PRODEQUIV_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_PRODUCIDO_EDIT_ANUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN PERF_SWPRODTEOR = 'S' THEN PERF_PRODTEOR ELSE PERF_PRODUCIDO END) AS PERF_PRODUCIDO_EDIT_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_PRODULABO_EDIT_ANUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN PERF_LABORABLE = 'S' AND (PERF_PRODUCIDO != 0 OR (PERF_TBONO + PERF_TMUESTRAS) != PERF_TBOCADILLO) THEN CASE WHEN PERF_SWPRODTEOR = 'S' THEN PERF_PRODTEOR ELSE PERF_PRODUCIDO END ELSE 0 END) AS PERF_PRODULABO_EDIT_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TDESCANSO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TDESCANSO) AS PERF_TDESCANSO_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TMOD_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TMOD) AS PERF_TMOD_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TMUESTRAS_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TMUESTRAS) AS PERF_TMUESTRAS_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TNECESPERS_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TNECESPERS) AS PERF_TNECESPERS_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TNOCONTROL_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TNOCONTROL) AS PERF_TNOCONTROL_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TNOIMPUT_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TNOIMPUT) AS PERF_TNOIMPUT_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TNPRODNP_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TNPRODNP) AS PERF_TNPRODNP_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TNPRODP_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TNPRODP) AS PERF_TNPRODP_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPARO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPARO) AS PERF_TPARO_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPCARTACOL_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPCARTACOL) AS PERF_TPCARTACOL_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPDECICOME_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPDECICOME) AS PERF_TPDECICOME_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPIMASD_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPIMASD) AS PERF_TPIMASD_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPREFORMA_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPREFORMA) AS PERF_TPREFORMA_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPAROCONOF_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPAROCONOF) AS PERF_TPAROCONOF_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPAROPROGR_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPAROPROGR) AS PERF_TPAROPROGR_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPESPEURGE_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPESPEURGE) AS PERF_TPESPEURGE_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPRESENCIA_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPRESENCIA) AS PERF_TPRESENCIA_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_CONSUMIDO_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_CONSUMIDO) AS PERF_CONSUMIDO_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_CADENA_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_CADENA) AS PERF_CADENA_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_CAPSUCAMB_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_CAPSUCAMB) AS PERF_CAPSUCAMB_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_PRODCAMB_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_PRODCAMB) AS PERF_PRODCAMB_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_NROCAMBC_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_NROCAMBC) AS PERF_NROCAMBC_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPOCAMBC_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOCAMBC) AS PERF_TPOCAMBC_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPOREGLC_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOREGLC) AS PERF_TPOREGLC_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPOTINTC_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOTINTC) AS PERF_TPOTINTC_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPOCAMB_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOCAMB) AS PERF_TPOCAMB_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPOREGL_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOREGL) AS PERF_TPOREGL_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_TPOTINT_ANUAL, SUM(PERF_TPOTINT) AS PERF_TPOTINT_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_PROD_DESP_MENSUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_PROD_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_PROD_DESP_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_CONS_DESP_ANUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_CONS_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_CONS_DESP_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_CAD_DESP_ANUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_CAD_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_CAD_DESP_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_CCAMB_DESP_ANUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_CCAMB_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_CCAMB_DESP_MENSUAL, SUM(NULL) AS PERF_PCAMB_DESP_ANUAL, SUM(CASE WHEN (PERF_CONS_DESP - PERF_CAD_DESP) != 0 THEN PERF_PCAMB_DESP ELSE NULL END) AS PERF_PCAMB_DESP_MENSUAL FROM TPROPERF_L WHERE PERF_FECHAJOR > :AnoRupturaBV || '0000' AND PERF_FECHAJOR <= :HastaFechaBV GROUP BY TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PERF_FECHAJOR, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMM')), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PERF_FECHAJOR, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'MONTH'), 1, PERF_EMPRESA, PERF_SECCION, PERF_CELULA ) WHERE PERF_EMPRESA = NVL(:PerfEmpresaBV, PERF_EMPRESA) AND PERF_SECCION = NVL(:PerfSeccionBV, PERF_SECCION) AND PERF_CELULA = NVL(:PerfCelulaBV, PERF_CELULA) GROUP BY PERF_PERIODO, PERF_PERIODO_EDIT, PERF_TIPO_PERIODO, PERF_EMPRESA, PERF_SECCION
